name: About The Brand
description: A LITTLE ABOUT THE BUSINESS… Eccentric Elegance is a fabulously girly little brand, run by Emily-Jane, guaranteed to have something to suit your taste, and your bank balance! Specialising in customised clothing and accessories, hand crafted jewellery and the like! All made with a certain dash of eccentric elegance! Emily-Jane designs, manufactures and sells her items single-handedly, and would like to thank family and friends for their help and support along the way. Eccentric Elegance was started in the summer of 2004 and continues to be a successful and growing business at local craft fairs, and now online. If you are an owner of a fashion business, or an online store and would like to stock Eccentric Elegance goods, please contact Emily-Jane at eccentricelegance@hotmail.com If you would like to feature Eccentric Elegance products in your magazine, blog or Ezine, please contact Emily-Jane at eccentricelegance@hotmail.com If you have any requests for custom orders, from handcrafted cards and invitations to full on hand painted dresses or even luggage and anything in between, or would like Eccentric Elegance to be a part of your design or craft event, please contact Emily Jane at eccentricelegance@hotmail.com Any more Qs? (You've got the idea by now I'm sure), please contact Emily-Jane at eccentricelegance@hotmail.com

name: FAQs
description: SIZING INFO XS: 12" (Approx. Size 6) S: 14.5" (Approx. Size 8-10) M: 16" (Approx. Size 12) L: 18" (Approx. Size 14-16) XL: 20.5" (Approx. Size 18) Please use the dress sizes given above as a guide only. For best results lay your favourite tee flat and measure from underarm to underarm, then see how the measurements correspond to those above. Remember, all our tees are stretch cotton, so if you prefer a baggier tee opt for a size larger, or a size smaller is you like it fitted. S-M: 13" (Approx. Size 8-10) M-L: 14.5" (Approx. Size 12-14) Please use the dress sizes given above as a guide only. For best results lay your favourite pair of knickers flat and measure from side to side, then see how the measurements correspond to those above. SHIPPING INFO To anywhere within the UK it is £1.99 For International shipping, all items will be sent by surface mail and will cost £4.50 All items will be well wrapped by moi and shipped at the most two days after your order, but usually immediately, by First Class mail meaning you should get your order between 2-5 working days. I'VE GOT A CRAZY IDEA FOR SOMETHING ONE-OF-A-KIND, CAN YOU DO IT? If you have any requests for custom orders, from handcrafted cards and invitations to full on hand painted dresses or even luggage and anything in between, or would like Eccentric Elegance to be a part of your design or craft event, please contact Emily Jane at eccentricelegance@hotmail.com Any more Qs? please contact Emily-Jane at eccentricelegance@hotmail.com HOW CAN I SUPPORT ECCENTRIC ELEGANCE? Visit: www.myspace.com/eccentricelegance add us as a friend, put us in your top friends, stick a banner on your profile, tell all your friends about us and we will love you forever!

name: All Fur Coat and No Knickers
description:
'A wave for the cameras
All fur coat and no knickers
Jayne Mansfield she came down
To cheer up the town'
CHUMBAWUMBA

There'll be no excuse for forgetting your underwear when it's as cute as this.

Perfect as a present or just a little treat for yourself!


Check FAQs for note on sizing.

This item has been hand-painted with love using high quality fabric paint.

Any imperfections are due to the true indie spirit in which it was created and ensues all items are 100% unique.

name: Senorita with a Necklace of Tears (Pink)
description:
'If I could play all the memories
In the neck of my guitar
I’d write a song called
“Senorita with a necklace of tears” '
PAUL SIMON

There'll be no need to worry about accessorising with this fab tee, the jewellery's already attached for you!


Check FAQs for note on sizing.

This item has been hand-painted with love using high quality fabric paint, vintage necklace and embellishments.

Any imperfections are due to the true indie spirit in which it was created and ensues all items are 100% unique.
